mapper.select: select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터%' and payment not like '%스폐셜%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 일반%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 1.3%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 2.3%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 3.6%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 6.6%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%스폐셜%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 스폐셜A%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 스폐셜B%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 스폐셜C%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%데이터 스폐셜D%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%망내%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%망내 34%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%망내 42%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%망내 52%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE%' and payment not like '%망내%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 시니어%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 34%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 42%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 52%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 62%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 72%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 85%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 100%'
select * from lg_pay where payment like '%LTE 120%'
